title: Dominance of the Shanahan System + Pete Carroll & Dr. Michael Gervais on Development of Players
itunes:title: Dominance of the Shanahan System + Pete Carroll & Dr. Michael Gervais on Development of Players
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys are joined by Seahawks head coach Pete Carroll and psychologist Dr. Michael Gervais, as they talk about the process of developing players and also about QB Russell Wilson (1:53). Next, the pair react to the news of Cowboys and Texans players testing positive for COVID-19 and look at how teams will handle the challenges from the pandemic (12:44). After that, the duo do a deep dive on the Shanahan system and discuss why it's so dominant (19:35). To wrap up the show, the guys break down the traits of a few college players that fans should watch out for this season (29:26).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
